info.description: The Policy microservice is responsible for all interactions involving policies, carriers, change requests, and all policy level information.
info.title: Policy Service API

post.description: Create the policy specified in the request. The created policy will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: newPolicyV1
parameters.description: A new policy to be created.

get.description: Retrieves a page of policy carriers that have been assigned to any policy. Useful for providing a list of policy carriers for further filtering of policies.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

get.description: Gets a policy by its ID.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the policy.

delete.description: Delete a policy. Only policies in status DRAFT can be deleted.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the policy.

get.summary: Get policy versions for a policy.
get.description: Retrieves a page of policy versions ordered by their updated date, descending.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Policy ID

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

post.description: Create the policy version specified within the body of this request. The created policy version will be returned. Versions can be created only for policies not in DRAFT status.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: policyId
parameters.description: ID of the policy

parameters.name: newPolicyVersionV1
parameters.description: A new policy version to be created

get.description: Gets a policy version by ID.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: policyId
parameters.description: ID of the policy

parameters.name: versionId
parameters.description: ID of the policy version

patch.description: Updates a policy version. Only allowed for DRAFT, CANCELLATION_PENDING, REINSTATEMENT_PENDING, (editable) versions.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: patch
parameters.description: Policy version changes.

parameters.name: policyId
parameters.description: ID of the policy.

parameters.name: versionId
parameters.description: ID of the policy version.

get.description: Retrieves the page of policies specified by IDs provided.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: ids

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: ids

get.description: Retrieves the page of policies specified by list of statuses provided.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

parameters.name: statuses
parameters.description: Filter results by specified policy statuses.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Filter results by specified customer ID.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: hideCancelled
parameters.description: Whether to hide policies with CANCELLED status.

parameters.name: sortField
parameters.description: Sort results by specified column.

parameters.name: isDescending
parameters.description: Whether or not to sort the results in descending order.

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Search term, searches policy number.

parameters.name: carrierId
parameters.description: Filter results by specified carrier ID.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Filter results by specified customer ID.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

authUserId.description: Auth user id of the employee

CommissionableEmployeeV1.description: This model describes a Commissionable employee for the policy.

tenantId.description: ID of the Tenant in which the resource is stored

entityId.description: ID of the Entity in which the resource is stored

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

requestId.description: The unique ID of this request.

spanId.description: The unique ID of the span.

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.

method.description: The method of paging that this pagingInfo contains

numberOfElements.description: The number of data elements in this response.

page.description: The page number of the response.

pageSize.description: The page size of this response.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages, based on the pageSize and totalElements

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

requestId.description: The unique ID of this request.

spanId.description: The unique ID of the span.

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.

spanId.description: The unique ID of the span.

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

relatedObjects.description: A map of different kinds of objects related to the response. Each key in the map is a type of object that is referenced from the content of the response, e.g. a User or an Entity. Each value of the map is itself a map, but of the objects' IDs to the objects themselves so as to allow looking each object up via the ID that was provided in the content.

requestId.description: The unique ID of this request.

spanId.description: The unique ID of the span.

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.

productLineOfBusinessId.description: Contextual ID of the line of business from the Product Service.

productLineOfCoverageId.description: Contextual ID of the line of coverage from the Product Service.

PolicyProductLineOfBusinessV1.description: The Lines of Business and any associated Line of Coverage for the Policy.

agencyCommission.description: The agency commission amount. Can be a Percentage or Flat value based on the agencyCommissionType field. Entered values should be between 0.00 and 100.00 if Percentage and above 0.00 if Flat.

agencyCommissionType.description: The agency commission type. Determines validation for the agencyCommission field.

billingType.description: Billing type for the policy. Can be either DIRECT or AGENCY.

carrierId.description: Unique ID of the Writing Carrier.

commissionableEmployees.description: List of commissionable employees for the policy. Max = 4 employees, total commission for should be equal to 100%. If no commissionable employees supplied,system will use Primary Producer, assigned to customer, if customer doesn't have Primary Producer - system will assign first Producer as commissionable employee

createdBy.description: The user/role who created the policy.

customerId.description: ID of the customer the policy belongs to.

effectiveDate.description: Date when the policy becomes effective.

entityId.description: ID of the entity associated with the policy.

exposureGroupId.description: Unique Contextual ID of the Exposure Group.

latestVersionId.description: The ID of the most recent policy version. Note that this might be the ID of a non-defininitive version, such as CANCEL_PENDING.

modifiedBy.description: Unique ID of the last user/stream that modified the policy.

namedInsureds.description: Named Insureds listed on the policy.

policyNumber.description: Policy number. Must not exceed 30 characters.

policyProductLinesOfBusiness.description: Lines of business and lines of coverage for the policy.

updatedOn.description: When the definitive policy version was updated.

PolicyV1.description: This model describes a new or existing policy. Note that fields marked as required are optional on drafts, with the exception of policyStatus.

agencyCommission.description: The agency commission amount. Can be a Percentage or Flat value based on the agencyCommissionType field. Entered values should be between 0.00 and 100.00 if Percentage and above 0.00 if Flat.

agencyCommissionType.description: The agency commission type. Determines validation for the agencyCommission field.

billingType.description: The billing type of the policy.

carrierId.description: Unique ID of the writing carrier.

commissionableEmployees.description: List of commissionable employees for the policy. Max = 4 employees, total commission for should be equal to 100%. If no commissionable employees supplied,system will use Primary Producer, assigned to customer, if customer doesn't have Primary Producer - system will assign first Producer as commissionable employee

createdBy.description: The ID of the user who created the policy version.

createdOn.description: When the policy version was created.

earnedAgencyCommission.description: The commission an agency has earned corresponding to the time period remaining on an insurance policy.

effectiveDate.description: Date when the policy becomes effective.

formInstanceIds.description: The list of form instances associated to this policy version.

fullTermPremium.description: Premium of the full term of the policy.

id.description: Unique ID of the policy version.

modifiedBy.description: The ID of the user who last modified the policy version.

namedInsureds.description: Named insureds listed on the policy.

policyNumber.description: Policy number. Must not exceed 30 characters.

unearnedAgencyCommission.description: The commission an agency will earn corresponding to the time period remaining on an insurance policy.

unearnedPremium.description: The premium corresponding to the time period remaining on an insurance policy.

updatedOn.description: When the most recent policy version was updated.

PolicyVersionV1.description: This model describes a new or existing policy version. Note that fields marked as required are optional on drafts, with the exception of policyStatus.

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

requestId.description: The unique ID of this request.

spanId.description: The unique ID of the span.

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.

Each key in the map is a type of object that is referenced from the content of the response, e.g. a User or an Entity. Each value of the map is itself a map, but of the objects' IDs to the objects themselves so as to allow looking each object up via the ID that was provided in the content.
